description:
go.crypto/ssh: fix tests with -cpu 1,2.

When running the ssh tests several times (e.g. with -cpu 1,2), the
second run would fail because testing globals had been altered. This
change avoids altering the globals since the default worked anyway.

Fixes issue 4715.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.crypto/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=dacdc6831675&repo=crypto ***

go.crypto/ssh: fix tests with -cpu 1,2.

When running the ssh tests several times (e.g. with -cpu 1,2), the
second run would fail because testing globals had been altered. This
change avoids altering the globals since the default worked anyway.

Fixes issue 4715.

R=golang-dev, minux.ma
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7903045

subject: code review 7903045: go.crypto/ssh: fix tests with -cpu 1,2.
